title: Task Management
page_description: Manage development tasks in projects, track task progress and status

empty.title: No tasks yet
empty.description: Create your first task to get started

form.requirementDescPlaceholder: Describe the specific requirements and goals of the task
form.requirementDescHint: This will be recorded as the initial conversation for the task
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe the specific content and requirements of the task
form.branchHint: Specify the Git branch name to start development
form.devEnvironmentHint: Optionally select a development environment to execute this task

messages.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the task "{{title}}"? This action cannot be undone.
messages.push_confirm: Are you sure you want to push this task's branch to the remote repository?

push.confirm_description: You are about to push the task branch to the remote repository. Please confirm the following information.
push.warning_description: The push operation will upload your changes to the remote repository, and other team members will be able to see these changes.
push.final_confirm_description: This is your last chance to confirm. Please review carefully.
push.final_warning: Warning: This operation cannot be undone!
push.final_warning_details: You are about to push branch "{{branch}}" to repository "{{repository}}". After pushing, changes will be visible to all team members.
push.pushing_description: Pushing your changes to the remote repository...
push.please_wait: Please wait, do not close this window
push.success_message: Branch has been successfully pushed to remote repository
push.success_details: Branch "{{branch}}" has been successfully pushed to repository "{{repository}}".
push.error_message: An error occurred during the push process

batch.confirmUpdate: Are you sure you want to update the status of {{count}} selected tasks to "{{status}}"?
batch.noItemsSelected: Please select tasks to operate on

errors.noBranchesFound: No branches found in the repository
errors.noGitCredential: Project has no associated Git credential, please associate a Git Credential before pushing

no_commit_hash_desc: This conversation has no associated commit hash
